duties_responsibilities.duty: Travel to client's facilities to perform calibration, diagnostics, and repairs to HVAC controls through the building automation system.
Work with Brewer-Garrett technical workforce to understand how the HVAC equipment operates and how the control system impacts that operation.
Assist in face-to-face work with customers in a professional, conscientious manner and provide customer training as needed.
Experience configuring, designing, and debugging PLC ladder logic and HMI programs.
Experience integrating field devices (VFD's, Valves, Process Instruments) with PLC's using data sheets only.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 3 years of automation experience.
Understanding of BAS Systems and ability to read and write programming.
Understanding the operation of commercial HVAC equipment.
